entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , North Battleford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:26 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -17.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Battleford Airport 2:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -17.5°C
Pressure: 103.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -29
Dewpoint: -21.6°C
Wind: ESE 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 26. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
